resources.string:
"Domain

Enter in the domain name of the site, like \"gmail.com\" or \"facebook.com\".

Password Length

Not all sites will allow you to add a really long password. For those that don\'t, you can specify a length and the password passed to the paste buffer will be trimmed accordingly. Leave it blank or at 0 to use the full-length hashed password.

Secret

Enter in your universal password.

Get more information and source code at passapus.com



"
